References
==========

1. For the initial inspiration for writing this module: Randall Munroe (https://xkcd.com/936/)

2. For a good word list: https://github.com/dwyl/english-words

3. For a nice reST language cheat sheet: https://github.com/ralsina/rst-cheatsheet

4. For the theory behind Diceware: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diceware

5. And finally for the gentle introduction to reST and Sphinx with his wonderful tutorial: Brandon Rhodes (https://github.com/brandon-rhodes/sphinx-tutorial)
